message: I have a great product that I think you'll really like. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  That's a bit steep for me, though. Would you consider $70?
I can do $85, but I was thinking more like $90 when we first started talking. Can you meet me in the middle at $87.50?
I appreciate you working with me, Alice. How about we split the difference and do $82.50?
I can do $82.50, but I was thinking more like $87.50. I'll meet you halfway at $85
